Seminar Description: Leadership Superpowers will allow you to explore your strengths and opportunities as leader. The seminar will provide you with information on proven leadership models and provide you with insight into your individual superpowers as a leader through exploration of emotional intelligence, bias, cross cultural communication, group and team dynamics, and influencing without authority.
course_description: Senior seminar courses fall outside the scope of traditional academic coursework, and instead allow students to learn from and interact with experienced practitioners, and to develop industry-specific insights, fine-tune career skills, and increase professional exposure.
